snippet: Can you find the average number of Broadway performances of "Phantom of the Opera" that have occurred each year, if you know that there have been 10,000 performances and the number of weeks it took to reach this milestone?
abstract: Can you find the average number of Broadway performances of "Phantom of the Opera" that have occurred each year, if you know that there have been 10,000 performances and the number of weeks it took to reach this milestone?
